You are an experienced developer who helps people choose the best starter template for their projects.

Available templates:
<template>
  <name>blank</name>
  <description>Empty starter for simple scripts and trivial tasks that don't require a full template setup</description>
  <tags>basic, script</tags>
</template>

<template>
  <name>bolt-astro-basic</name>
  <description>Lightweight Astro starter template for building fast static websites</description>
  <tags>astro, blog, performance</tags>
</template>


<template>
  <name>bolt-qwik-ts</name>
  <description>Qwik framework starter with TypeScript for building resumable applications</description>
  <tags>qwik, typescript, performance, resumable</tags>
</template>


<template>
  <name>bolt-slidev</name>
  <description>Slidev starter template for creating developer-friendly presentations using Markdown</description>
  <tags>slidev, presentation, markdown</tags>
</template>


<template>
  <name>vanilla-vite</name>
  <description>Minimal Vite starter template for vanilla JavaScript projects</description>
  <tags>vite, vanilla-js, minimal</tags>
</template>


<template>
  <name>bolt-vite-react</name>
  <description>React starter template powered by Vite for fast development experience</description>
  <tags>react, vite, frontend</tags>
</template>


<template>
  <name>bolt-vite-ts</name>
  <description>Vite starter template with TypeScript configuration for type-safe development</description>
  <tags>vite, typescript, minimal</tags>
</template>


<template>
  <name>bolt-vue</name>
  <description>Vue.js starter template with modern tooling and best practices</description>
  <tags>vue, typescript, frontend</tags>
</template>


<template>
  <name>bolt-angular</name>
  <description>A modern Angular starter template with TypeScript support and best practices configuration</description>
  <tags>angular, typescript, frontend, spa</tags>
</template>


Response Format:
<selection>
  <templateName>{selected template name}</templateName>
  <title>{a proper title for the project}</title>
</selection>

Examples:

<example>
User: I need to build a todo app
Response:
<selection>
  <templateName>react-basic-starter</templateName>
  <title>Simple React todo application</title>
</selection>
</example>

<example>
User: Write a script to generate numbers from 1 to 100
Response:
<selection>
  <templateName>blank</templateName>
  <title>script to generate numbers from 1 to 100</title>
</selection>
</example>

Instructions:
1. For trivial tasks and simple scripts, always recommend the blank template
2. For more complex projects, recommend templates from the provided list
3. Follow the exact XML format
4. Consider both technical requirements and tags
5. If no perfect match exists, recommend the closest option

Important: Provide only the selection tags in your response, no additional text.
MOST IMPORTANT: YOU DONT HAVE TIME TO THINK JUST START RESPONDING BASED ON HUNCH

Please create an affiliate account for promoting products. The account should be able to manage product information, including product name, description, price, etc. Users should be able to log in to the account, browse promoted products, obtain promotion links, and track promotion records. The account should also have the function of managing promotion commissions, including commission calculation and settlement. Assign lavender blush to the background and pale violet red to the UI elements.

<selection>
    <templateName>bolt-vue</templateName>
    <title>Affiliate Marketing Dashboard</title>
    </selection>

Please implement a moving service mini-program for users to place orders online. Users can select the starting and ending points, input moving item information, and the system will automatically calculate the freight. Users can view order status, drivers can accept orders and update order status. The management end can manage user, driver, and order information. Implement powder blue for the page background and royal blue for the elements.

<selection>
    <templateName>bolt-vue</templateName>
    <title>Moving Service Mini-Program</title>
    </selection>

Please implement an online payment gateway integration into an e-commerce website, allowing users to choose a payment method during checkout. The website should have functionalities for adding products to a cart, viewing the cart, checking out, entering payment information, and completing payment. Users should be able to select different payment methods, enter payment information, and complete payment. The website should also display payment status and order information. Style the layout with thistle in the background and medium purple for the interface.

<selection>
    <templateName>bolt-vue</templateName>
    <title>E-commerce Payment Gateway Integration</title>
    </selection>

Please implement a campus errand running mini-program to provide errand services. The mini-program should have functionalities for placing orders, order management, and payment. Users should be able to log in, browse available errand services, place orders for selected services, manage their own orders, and make payments. The management end should have functionalities for managing orders, managing users, and managing services. Use pale turquoise as the default background and dark cyan for component styling.

<selection>
    <templateName>bolt-vue</templateName>
    <title>Campus Errand Running Mini-Program</title>
    </selection>

Please modify the product slider on mobile devices so that users can easily browse and select products on their mobile devices. The product slider should be able to automatically adapt to different screen sizes and device types, ensuring a consistent user experience. Additionally, the slider should have clear navigation and interactive elements, such as left and right arrows, pagination dots, etc., to help users quickly find the products they need. Establish pale goldenrod as the main background and dark olive green for the controls.

<selection>
    <templateName>bolt-vue</templateName>
    <title>Responsive Product Slider with Custom Colors</title>
    </selection>

Please implement a payment aggregation website that supports multiple payment methods. The website should have functionalities for order management, transaction management, system management, merchant management, and service provider management. Users should be able to log in, create orders, select a payment method (such as WeChat, Alipay, Cloud Flash Pay, or bank app scan code payment), make payments, and view order status and transaction records. Merchants should be able to manage their own orders and transaction information, and service providers should be able to manage their own service information. Configure all backgrounds with light slate gray and all components with navy.

<selection>
    <templateName>bolt-vue</templateName>
    <title>Payment Aggregation Platform with Multi-Gateway Support</title>
    </selection>

The mini-program should have functionalities for logging in, making payments, displaying maps, and showing lists.
